messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
Oh, we’ll ride upon the sea,
in a boat, just you and me!That’s the way of the Sailor!
Way of the Sailor. Sing it!
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
You ought to think about becoming
a Sailor yourself.It’s been great to be able to visit
different places around the world.
messages.TRMSG_REMATCH:
Oh, we’ll ride upon the sea,
in a boat, just you and me!That’s the way of the Sailor!
Way of the Sailor. You sing, too!
